name: Gastroenterology Digestive Health Screening Package
description: Comprehensive gastrointestinal screening protocols including colorectal cancer screening and liver disease assessment

screening_types.name: Colonoscopy - Average Risk
screening_types.description: Standard colonoscopy screening for colorectal cancer (average risk)

screening_types.name: Colonoscopy - High Risk
screening_types.description: Enhanced colonoscopy screening for high-risk colorectal cancer patients

screening_types.name: Flexible Sigmoidoscopy
screening_types.description: Flexible sigmoidoscopy for colorectal cancer screening

screening_types.name: FIT Test
screening_types.description: Fecal immunochemical test for colorectal cancer screening

screening_types.name: Upper Endoscopy - Surveillance
screening_types.description: EGD surveillance for Barrett's esophagus and gastric pathology

screening_types.name: Upper Endoscopy - GERD
screening_types.description: EGD for chronic GERD evaluation and surveillance

screening_types.name: Hepatitis B Screening
screening_types.description: Hepatitis B surface antigen and antibody screening

screening_types.name: Hepatitis C Screening
screening_types.description: Hepatitis C antibody screening for all adults

screening_types.name: Liver Function Tests
screening_types.description: Comprehensive liver function panel (ALT, AST, bilirubin, alkaline phosphatase)

screening_types.name: Hepatic Ultrasonography
screening_types.description: Liver ultrasound for fatty liver disease and hepatic pathology screening

screening_types.name: Celiac Disease Screening
screening_types.description: Tissue transglutaminase antibody and total IgA for celiac disease

screening_types.name: H. Pylori Testing
screening_types.description: Helicobacter pylori testing for peptic ulcer disease and gastritis

screening_types.name: Inflammatory Bowel Disease Monitoring
screening_types.description: Regular monitoring for IBD patients with colonoscopy and laboratory studies

screening_types.name: Pancreatic Cancer Screening - High Risk
screening_types.description: EUS and MRI/MRCP for high-risk pancreatic cancer screening
